name: Prisme Libre Skin-Caring 24H Hydrating + Radiant + Correcting Creamy Concealer
about: What it is:A revolutionary, hydrating, 24-hour wear concealer formulated with 95 percent natural-origin ingredients that conceals, corrects, and cares for skin..Coverage:Medium.Finish:Radiant.Formulation:Cream.Highlighted Ingredients:- Plant-Based Glycerin: Offers up to 24-hour hydration and maintains skin’s moisture barrier..What Else You Need to Know:The water-resistant formula of this medium coverage, multi-purpose, concealer illuminates as it provides 24-hour hydration³ and radiance¹, while offering a natural result. Immediately, the cooling effect of the creamy texture creates a refreshing sensation on the eye area while improving skin quality. The result is a visibly smoother, hydrated, lifted appearance, and more even-looking eye area..Clinical Results:Self-assessment by questionnaire with 104 women from 20 to 40 years old, tested at least once a day during 1 week of use:
ingredients: Aqua (Water) C9-12 Alkane, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Glycerin, Pentylene Glycol, Coco-Caprylate/Caprate, Propanediol, Stearalkonium Hectorite , Trimethylsiloxysilicate , Pullulan, Sorbitan  Sesquiisostearate , Silica , Polyglyceryl-3 Polyricinoleate , Polyglyceryl-3 Diisostearate , Mica , Sodium Myristoyl Glutamate, Sodium Chloride, Centaurea Cyanus Flower Water , Hydroxyacetophenone, Ethylene Brassylate, Sodium Benzoate, Tropaeolum Majus Flower/Leaf/Stem Extract , Aluminum Hydroxide, Synthetic Fluorphlogopite, Polyhydroxystearic Acid, Propylene Carbonate, Biosaccharide Gum-2, Isostearic Acid, Lecithin, Potassium Sorbate, Citric Acid, Tin Oxide, Tocopherol, [+/- Ci 77891 (Titanium Dioxide) , Ci 77491, Ci77492, Ci 77499 (Iron Oxides), Ci 77163 (Bismuth Oxychloride)]
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Using the applicator tip, dot on the concealer, targeting the desired area (eye contour, blemishes, dark circles, spots, etc.)..-Blend with your fingertips, a brush, or a blender for fuller coverage and even more correction. .-To brighten the undereye area, select one to two shades lighter than your perfect concealer shade.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I can’t say enough about this product. I’ve been using this Givenchy concealer for almost 2 years. For my mature, dry skin, the ingredients are very hydrating, no creasing, and blends nicely with a brush or my finger. I don’t use powder under my eyes, rather, I spray Milk Hydo Grip setting spray before and after my makeup application. I prefer a natural, dewy look all year round. I’ve recently paired this with the Givenchy peach color corrector for my dark circles. Both products are must haves!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I can’t say enough about this product. I’ve been using this Givenchy concealer for almost 2 years. For my mature, dry skin, the ingredients are very hydrating, no creasing, and blends nicely with a brush or my finger. I don’t use powder under my eyes, rather, I spray Milk Hydo Grip setting spray before and after my makeup application. I prefer a natural, dewy look all year round. This product is a must have.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The product is good however after a while completely changes and creases. Doest cover much too

reviews.review_shade_purchased: N250 - light to medium with neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I haven’t seen anyone talk about this concealer but I really like it! I struggle with finding a good shade match for me and have tried literally every concealer at Sephora. This one had a good shade match for me and nice coverage!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The Givenchy Prisme Libre Skin-Caring 24-Hour Hydrating Concealer is an excellent choice for anyone seeking a medium-coverage, radiant finish that feels creamy and lightweight on the skin. The formula is hydrating, infused with plant-based glycerin, and provides up to 24-hour moisture while maintaining a natural look. It blends seamlessly, leaving the skin looking smooth, hydrated, and refreshed, with noticeable improvements in dark circles and redness. The creamy texture is particularly comfortable for all-day wear, making it perfect for both everyday use and special occasions. Highly recommend it for its multitasking capabilities and skin-caring benefits!

reviews.review_title: Very natural finish and it doesn't crease!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love this concealer so much. The shade match is spot on, and the finish is very natural, plus it doesn't crease. I highly recommend it if you're going for a natural finish.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: A little thick and drying for under eyes or over fine lines

reviews.review_shade_purchased: N95 - very fair with neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I liked this at first but after only a couple of uses I realized not only was it separating and oxidizing on my skin, it also was separating in the tube. So expensive and not worth it, spend your money on Nars !

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This concealer is great if you’re looking for something that’s lightweight and skin like. It’s not extremely glowy but also not matte. I find it good as someone who prefers a natural makeup look. I like to use this with both a beauty blender and brush. The coverage is good and is long lasting as well. I haven’t experienced any creasing or patchiness either. I did a comparison with some of my other concealers. The top if Givenchy W310, the middle is Dior Forever Skin Correct in 4 Warm, and the bottom is Westman Atelier Vital Skincare in T2.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I didn’t like this product at all. It’s separated on my skin for a while now and when I dumped a little out to mix with a color corrector I realized it’s actually separated. Cheap product, many other better concealers.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Es súper cremoso, no me reseca la ojera. Es sin duda de mis favoritos.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I didn’t enjoy this concealer. It separated immediately on my skin.

reviews.review_title: sure...it's a splurge. but it's worth it so far!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brunette hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: i just got this today and have been swatching it since getting home. first, great color match. second, love the bottle. third, it feels SO good to the touch. fourth, it blends so easily and covers with true medium coverage with one swipe. i cannot wait to see it tomorrow am!!!

reviews.review_title: BUY. THIS. RIGHT. NOW!!! Do ittttt
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: GUYS!! LISTEN UP!!! This is one of the BEST concealers I have ever used. I’ve been on this long journey trying to find something like this and was inspired after trying Givenchy’a amazing foundation. This concealer doesn’t break me out and blends perfectly. It’s lightweight, smooth and shiny (not too shiny/ sweaty though), sweat-resistant (I mean I wore it in the shower and it barely budged). I can’t recommend this ENOUGH!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Nice coverage and colour match. I’m happy with my purchase. Just need to put a powder on top after so it doesn’t crease.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I’m not a big fan of this product, this product was recommended to me by an employee at Sephora and after having it for a while now.. I can attest that this concealer is one you can ditch if you’re planning to purchase it! The coverage isn’t the best, if you’re a beginner in doing your makeup it will take a while for you to learn how to use this concealer because it can either be a hit or miss. I had a big struggle learning how to use this concealer because if your skin isn’t prepped correctly it will get patchy. This concealer is more “wet” like, and not as hydrating as I thought it would be, also I believe this concealer is easier to blend with a concealer brush not a beauty blender. What I do love is that it isn’t heavy on the face, and it looks very skin like!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I don't hate it, but I like it. Hate the scent. I put a lot of concealer around my nose and perfumes give me headaches and mildly triggers my rosecea when I am trying to conceal it. I almost never buy luxury beauty because of perfume, but I made an exception because someone told me it was very hydrating and is a lot of product for the money.  I don't really find it nearly as hydrating as I was told it would be. It doesn't misbehave but it leaves me wanting to use something else after every time I use it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My favorite concealer of all time. Perfect for summer and winter! Does not look patchy and works sooo good with the makeup by Mario foundation another fave!!!

reviews.review_title: sure...it's a splurge. but it's worth it so far!
